title: mm的仇恨值掉落怎么调几率
author: ヾ羽墨ゝ
txt_content:
配置如下青山弟子:
  Type: zombie
  Display: '&a&l青山弟子'
  Disguise:
    Type: player
    Player: '&a&l青山弟子'
    Skin: AnderXL
  Health: 1000
  Damage: 0
  BossBar:
    Enabled: true
    Title: '&a&l<mob.name> &c&l血量:<mob.hp>/<mob.mhp> &b&l 目标:<mob.tt.top>'
    Range: 150
    Color: BLUE
    Style: SEGMENTED_20
  DamageModifiers:
  - FIRE_TICK 0
  - FIRE 0
  AIGoalSelectors:
  - 0 clear
  - 1 meleeattack
  - 2 lookatplayers
  AITargetSelectors:
  - 0 clear
  - 1 hurtbytarget
  Modules:
    ThreatTable: true
    ImmunityTable: true
  Equipment:
  - 铁帽:4
  - 铁甲:3
  - 铁裤:2
  - 铁靴:1
  - 青山弟子:0
  KillMessages:
  - '&7[&b<target.name>&7] &6被 &c<mob.name>&6 砍死了'
  Skills:
  - potion{type=FIRE_RESISTANCE;duration=200;level=4} @self ~onTimer:10
  - command{c="mm items give <target.name> 青山残骸"} @Trigger ~onDeath
  - command{c="mm items give <target.name> 青山令"} @Trigger ~onDeath
  Options:
    AlwaysShowName: true
    KnockbackResistance: 1
    MovementSpeed: 0.4
    FollowRange: 5
    MaxCombatDistance: 5
    PreventOtherDrops: true
    NoDamageTicks: 5
    Despawn: true
  Drops:
  - sexp 10-15 1
  - 青山残骸 1 0.7
  - 青山残骸 2 0.01
  - 青山令 1 0.7
  - 青山令 2 0.01

replies.author: zhangjiaheng
replies.txt_content:
- command{c="mm items give <target.name> 青山残骸"} @Trigger ~onDeath
  - command{c="mm items give <target.name> 青山令"} @Trigger ~onDeath
这个有问题后面要加概率如
- command{c="mm items give <target.name> 青山残骸"} @Trigger ~onDeath 0.01  指百分之一掉落青山残骸
另外的下面的drop里面的掉落不用要
记得给最佳，谢谢
